body_html: @cclauss The flake8 command you included was helpful. However, I was asking about whether you could add a Python unit test in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/datasets/synthetic_test.py that exercises the previously problematic line, to prevent possible regressions in the future.

body: @cclauss The `flake8` command you included was helpful. However, I was asking about whether you could add a Python unit test in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/datasets/synthetic_test.py that exercises the previously problematic line, to prevent possible regressions in the future.
